ygData.subject: Re: Suggestion from my mailbox....
ygData.msgSnippet: Im sorry.  I am the main person doing this and Ill try to cut out one line non-sensical posts completely out.  I will also begin to trim the giant emails as
ygData.messageBody:
Im sorry. I am the main person doing this and Ill try to cut out one line
non-sensical posts completely out. I will also begin to trim the giant
emails as well. I will also check to see if someone has answered the
question or made a comment I was going to make from now on.

I think the main reason you will see lots of posts from me in a row is that
I live in a different time zone. When you guys are asleep im at work
reading the list. Therefore when you wake up in the morning you will see
lots of emails from me.

Thats not an excuse but one of the reasons why you will see a lot of emails
from me in one chunk and then none for a 24 hour stint. Ill try and cut
back, but I really like this list and perhaps I get to excited when replying
:)
